name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 429  Morning Temperature Check Before Work
description:
This proof records the environmental temperature and humidity measurement at MaMeeFarm™ before starting daily work.

The data was captured on 2026-01-03 at 07:00 (Asia/Bangkok) using an on-site digital thermometer/hygrometer (HTC-1).

This record reflects real-world conditions at the farm and is documented as part of the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) system to maintain continuity, transparency, and verifiable daily operations.

Measured values:

Temperature: 16.1 °C

Humidity: 72 %

No modification, reconstruction, or retrospective adjustment was performed.
